nodes.text: Leego Dov was a male smuggler during the Galactic War who could be found on the space station Carrick Station.

The Operations Gear Vendor for the Smuggler class, Leego Dov was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Game Update 2.4 on October 1, 2013, along with the other Operations Gear Vendors. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
